actions.text: Amendment SA 3097 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 3097 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S6214; text: CR S6214) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to facilitating the provision of internet service to the citizens of Cuba, who have been deprived of the free flow of information by the illegitimate communist Cuban regime.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3097 proposed by Senator Rubio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3097 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to facilitating the provision of internet service to the citizens of Cuba, who have been deprived of the free flow of information by the illegitimate communist Cuban regime.
